post_message: Four Kentucky couples are suing a clerk who is refusing to issue gay-marriage licenses — or any marriage licenses at all.  Rowan County Clerk Kim Davis says her Christian beliefs prevent her from complying with the #SCOTUSMarriage decision, so she will no longer issue marriage licenses to any couple, gay or straight.
